item.title: Don't seek perfection
item.description: Perfectionism is often seen as a good thing, and people should try and reach it whenever they can, but that may not always be true, being a perfectionist can stop you from finishing what you started or even not start at all..
item.content:encoded:
Perfectionism is often seen as a good thing, and people should try and reach it whenever they can, but that may not always be true, being a perfectionist can stop you from finishing what you started or even not start at all..

item.title: The Content Creation Dilemma
item.description: Every blogger needs to have a goal and an audience they are writting for in order to successed, today I shared my struggles in trying to figure out my goal and how it ended up being harder that expected

item.title: Making a Table of Contents with contentlayer

item.author: youssefbouzekri@proton.me (Yusuf Bouzekri)

item.title: Important Lessons from Adam Wathan's Refactoring UI
item.description: Refactoring UI is one of the best things I've read this year in terms of stuff learned, I feel like I've become a way better designer after reading every chapter, the thing I like about it is that it focuses a lot on the little things that when used together makes an average website 10x better
item.content:encoded:
Refactoring UI is one of the best things I've read this year in terms of stuff learned, I feel like I've become a way better designer after reading every chapter, the thing I like about it is that it focuses a lot on the little things that when used together makes an average website 10x better
